title: Computer freezes when i get in game??? Please help
body: When i tried to play league today everything went fine up to when we first spawned in. As soon as we spawn in my computer freezes and the past like .2 seconds of audio keeps repeating. I have to hard restart. I have tried everything from checking my drivers to going back to a previous version of windows 10. I have 20 minute queues now, ive hard restarted my computer at least 6 times in the past couple hours, and i really just wanna play league. Plz help!!

replies.body: Same here, I started getting this problem today after receiving the windows 10 anniversary update. My computer freezes in game and I have to restart it manually.

How far back did you revert your Windows 10 version? There were some anniversary updates that have been causing some problems after some Xbox game integrations rolled out. If you have those updates, I strongly recommend [rolling them back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) or uninstalling them to see if anything changes.

Let me know if you still see issues after making those changes or if you had already gotten rid of those updates.

So i just installed the new windows 10 anniversary update sunday. I tried playing monday and i noticed the problem. After a few games of the same glitch i rolled back to the previous update and it still didnt work yesterday at least. Ill try it again today but i dont have high hopes and i dont know how many more times i can afk without a ban

I definitely recommend testing changes in a custom match so you aren't at risk of Leaverbuster penalties. If rolling back doesn't work, you can try [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) entirely in case the Xbox DVR integrations were causing your issues.
